title: Title: Lollipop Font Poster
description: Lollipop font is created out of 6 different shapes with a 2/6 ratio. The font is playfull and can be used for posters.

title: Title: Lollipop Font Numbers
description: Lollipop font is created out of 6 different shapes with a 2/6 ratio.

title: Title: Coronaposter
description: Corona arrived in 2020, everyone was panicing and plundering stores. This poster contains the object that was sold out in almost every store during march 2020.

title: Title: Creative alphabet
description: Just having some fun with letters.

title: Title: Four Word Poster
description: Two four word posters with the opposite words.

title: Title: Graphic Trailer Bookbinding
description: I bookbinded this booklet mysel with a japanse binding. The pages are folded in two and the open side is binded together.

title: Title: Graphic Trailer Cover
description: This booklet is a visual trailer for the movie 'lost in translation'. The cover was made with some bright colours to refer to the bright colours in the city.

title: Title: Graphic Trailer Page
description: This booklet is a visual trailer for the movie 'lost in translation'. This is the middle page, a page with mixed feelings and a lot of uncertenty.

title: Title: Title: Kaleidoscope Font
description: A kaleidoscope creates an image that exists out of a continually changing pattern of shapes and colours. That is why I chose this as the name for my font. This font is created from a grid consisting out of rectangles and circles. From this grid three different weights were created. The font was made out of shapes that where placed on the grid. This has resulted in a colorful and playful font that seems to dance on the page. Find out more about the font on:https://kaleidoscope-font.netlify.app/index.html

title: Title: Kaleidoscope Font - Stampset
description: The Kaleidoscope font is created on a grid. Use these grid stamps on any paper and start making your own letters with the kaleidoscope grid! Find out more about the font on:https://kaleidoscope-font.netlify.app/index.html

title: Title: Kaleidoscope Postcard 'g'
description: A postcard that presented the letter 'g' from the Kaleidoscope font. Find out more about the font on:https://kaleidoscope-font.netlify.app/index.html

title: Title: Photocollage
description: A photocollage on a grid.

title: Title: Photocollage
description: A photocollage on a grid.

title: Title: The man with the moviecamera -Poster
description: This poster is made out of a quote from 'Dziga Vertov'.

title: Title: Rasterized Booklet
description: Experiments with 'Rasterizing' and 'Bitmap' in Photoshop.

title: Title: Rasterized Booklet
description: Experiments with 'Rasterizing' and 'Bitmap' in Photoshop.

title: Title: First Screen Print
description: Last year I made my first Screen Print Work in the atelier of Sint Lucas Antwerp.

title: Title: Gradient Flag
description: A flag I designed from the idea of movement. A flag moves a lot by itself, but the lines and the overflow give the flag even more dynamics.

title: Title: Fold-out Flyer
description: This fold-out poster is made under the theme of Graphic designer Fons Hickmann. It contains several works and references to his website.

title: Title: Fold-out Poster
description: This fold-out poster is made under the theme of Graphic designer Fons Hickmann. This is the back of the poster where I have posted images of his employees and a large image of him.

title: Title: The Serving Library Magazine
description: The Serving Library is a traveling exhibition that has been installed indefinitely at 019 in Ghent since the autumn of 2020. In this publication, various works from this exhibition have been used and converted to my own context.

title: Title: The Serving Library Magazine
description: The Serving Library is a traveling exhibition that has been installed indefinitely at 019 in Ghent since the autumn of 2020. In this publication, various works from this exhibition have been used and converted to my own context.

title: Title: The Serving Library Magazine
description: The Serving Library is a traveling exhibition that has been installed indefinitely at 019 in Ghent since the autumn of 2020. In this publication, various works from this exhibition have been used and converted to my own context.

title: Title: Endings - By-end
description: This series of posters (3) show different meanings of the end using 3 variations of the term. 'The end', 'Neverending' and 'By-end'. This poster contains the word 'by-end'. This word is seen as a selfish motive.

title: Title: Endings - Neverending
description: This series of posters (3) show different meanings of the end using 3 variations of the term. 'The end', 'Neverending' and 'By-end'. This poster contains the word 'Neverending'. The continued growth of new leaves despite the 'captivity in the pot' of the plant.

title: Title: Endings - The end
description: This series of posters (3) show different meanings of the end using 3 variations of the term. 'The end', 'Neverending' and 'By-end'. The last poster contains the word 'The end'. The dying of mature and senescent leaves.

title: Title: Zeitsprunge Poster
description: Ziesprunge means time jump. In this poster I make a link between classic and modern. Classical Ballet and the modern sport of Padel (which has actually been around for a long time but is only now finding its fame). This poster is a screen print, made with white, blue and silver ink on black paper.

title: Title: Rixou Font - App
description: Rixou is a modern and high-tech underground city under a nature reserve. For this city I designed a corporate identity that is modern but also radiates nature. An app was therefore indispensable for a high-tech city.

title: Title: Rixou Font - Reusable bag
description: Rixou is a modern and high-tech underground city under a nature reserve. For this city I designed a corporate identity that is modern but also radiates nature. In addition, the inhabitants of Rixou are ecologically minded.

title: Title: Rixou Font - Cup
description: Rixou is a modern and high-tech underground city under a nature reserve. For this city I designed a corporate identity that is modern but also radiates nature. In addition, the inhabitants of Rixou are ecologically minded.

title: Title: Rixou Font - Poster
description: Rixou is een moderne en hightech ondergrondse stad onder een natuurgebied. Voor deze stad ontwierp ik een corporate identity die modern is maar ook natuur uitstraalt. Deze poster promoot de nieuwe stad.
